verbs.description: [ARG1: A network TV show] [V: rolls] out [ARGM-MNR: with a favorable treatment of a Trump supporter , replete with plot developments that portray middle American values ( and foibles ) without the ridicule usually heaped upon them by Hollywood] .

A network TV show rolls out with a favorable treatment of a Trump supporter , replete with [ARG0: plot developments] [R-ARG0: that] [V: portray] [ARG1: middle American values ( and foibles )] [ARGM-MNR: without the ridicule usually heaped upon them by Hollywood] .

A network TV show rolls out with a favorable treatment of a Trump supporter , replete with plot developments that portray middle American values ( and foibles ) without [ARG1: the ridicule] [ARGM-TMP: usually] [V: heaped] [ARG2: upon them] [ARG0: by Hollywood] .
